Product_Description:
Key Features Futuristic Design : Featuring a classy design with stainless steel tank, the water purifier comes in black. It has a touch option with dispensing of Hot or Warm or Ambient water. Triple Protection Technology : 100% RO + Germicidal UV column + Germicidal UV LED, Powerful 9 stage purification provides absolute safe drinking water. Bacteriostatic Alkaline Technology, It improves the pH of purified water by adding back wide spectrum of natural minerals & trace elements, transforms regular water into Alkaline Water, which is healthier & tastier. Revitalizer restructures water molecules for improved hydration and mineral absorption. Convenience Features : Features iProtect purification monitoring that cuts off water if it is no longer safe to drink. UV LED provided on tank for 24x7 tank sanitation. Other features include smart indications & error alerts. Absolute Safety through 100% RO, Germicidal UV and UV LED ( Triple Purification) : 100% Water passes through the RO Membrane to ensure absolutely safe and pure drinking water. An optimum exposure of water to germicidal UV-C radiation in UV Disinfection Column makes water free from microbiological threats
like pathogenic bacteria and viruses. 24 × 7 tank sterilization UV LED prevents the Bio-film formation. Maintains hygiene of water and stainless steel tank. Installation & Warranty Experience best in class care 360 service & manufacturers warranty cover for 1 year. T&C apply. Cover your product with attractive extended warranty plans to enjoy life long safe and healthy drinking water.
Certifications: CE, ce, bee, ul, Ce, ISI, isi
